sneckomod:SneckoSoul.NAME: Snecko Soul
DESCRIPTIONS: You may Identify #yUnknown cards at Rest Sites.

sneckomod:SuperSneckoSoul.NAME: Super Snecko Soul
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces
.[] NL Using Identify at Rest Sites is now a Free Action.

sneckomod:CleanMud.NAME: Snake-Charmer's Flute
DESCRIPTIONS: #ysneckomod:Muddled cards can't cost #b3.

sneckomod:ConfusingCodex.NAME: Ring of the Snek
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, apply #b0-2 #yWeak and #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.

sneckomod:CrystallizedMud.NAME: Mesmerising Pendant
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. #ysneckomod:Muddled cards can't cost #b0.

sneckomod:LoadedDie.NAME: Loaded Die
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards that choose random numbers have +1 minimum.

sneckomod:RareBoosterPack.NAME: Rare Booster Box
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, obtain a #yUnknown #yRare card of each card type.

sneckomod:SleevedAce.NAME: Sleeved Ace
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a #yCheat into your hand with #yRetain.

sneckomod:UnknownEgg.NAME: Unknown Egg
sneckomod:UnknownEgg.FLAVOR: What will hatch? Pay $1000 to see.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yUnknown cards in card rewards are #yUpgraded.

sneckomod:SuperSneckoEye.NAME: Super Snecko Eye
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Snecko Eye. At the start of your turn, draw #b2 additional cards. Start each combat #yConfused. The first time you draw a card that costs #b3 each combat, reduce its cost to #b0.

sneckomod:SneckoTalon.NAME: Idol of Retromation
sneckomod:SneckoTalon.FLAVOR: Often called the Idol of Reto for short.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of the most expensive card in your hand by #b1 for this turn.

sneckomod:BlankCard.NAME: Blank Card
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, play a copy of a random card from your deck.

sneckomod:D8.NAME: Mystical Octahedron
sneckomod:D8.FLAVOR: It appears weighted toward one side.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card that selects a random number for its effects. This card always selects its maximum possible number.

is played, it chooses its maximum possible number for its effect.

sneckomod:BabySnecko.NAME: Young Snecko
DESCRIPTIONS: Deals #b5 damage to a random enemy at the start of your turn.

sneckomod:SneckoCommon.NAME: Seal of Approval
sneckomod:SneckoCommon.FLAVOR: I'm The Ironclad and this is my favorite Relic in the Spire.  -Merchant Advertising Pamphlet
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose #b1 of #b3 #yUnknown Character cards to add to your deck. All future Unknown Character cards found will be of this character.

cards.

sneckomod:SneckoBoss.NAME: Lucky Horseshoe
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose #b1 of #b3 #yUnknown Character cards. Add #b5 copies of it to your deck. All combats drop an additional card reward of the chosen character's cards.
